author: RFI
title: Bayer Leverkusen golea 4-0 en Países Bajos al Feyenoord
text:
Bayer Leverkusen golea 4-0 en Países Bajos al Feyenoord
Róterdam (Países Bajos) (AFP) – Bayer Leverkusen se impuso 4-0 en Países Bajos al Feyenoord en partido de la primera fecha de la Liga de Campeones, este jueves en el estadio De Kuip de Róterdam.
Primera modificación: Última modificación:
El campeón de Alemania, invicto la temporada pasada en la Bundesliga, encarriló pronto el partido con un gol de su internacional con la 'Mannschaft' Florian Wirtz en el minuto 5.
Los hombres de Xabi Alonso, finalistas de la última Europa League, completaron la goleada por medio del español Alejandro Grimaldo (30), Wirtz de nuevo (36), y con un gol en propia del arquero alemán del Feyenoord Wellenreuther (45).
Luego del repaso infligido por el Bayern de Múnich al Dinamo de Zagreb el martes (9-2), y de la victoria del Borussia Dortmund un día después en Brujas (3-0), este resultado confirma el buen inicio de los clubes alemanes en la máxima competición europea, sólo oscurecido por la derrota del Stuttgart en el Santiago Bernabéu ante el Real Madrid (3-1).
En la segunda fecha a comienzos de octubre, el Bayer recibirá al AC Milan, mientras que el Feyenoord visitará el Girona en España.
© 2024 AFP

author: Diego Vieira
title: Trader prevé un aumento del 400% en el precio de la criptomoneda Pi
text:
La recién lanzada criptomoneda Pi Network (PI) está captando la atención del mercado. En las últimas 24 horas, el token nativo de la red ha movido $3,29 mil millones. Este rendimiento sitúa al token, lanzado hace menos de una semana, en la sexta posición en términos de volumen de negociación, en una lista que incluye gigantes como Bitcoin, Ethereum y Solana.
Los datos de
CoinMarketCap muestran que el token de Pi Network es uno de los que más actividad genera en el mercado cripto en este momento. En las últimas 24 horas, solo Bitcoin, Ethereum y Solana, además de nuevas tendencias como IA Kaito y la memecoin Mystery, han movido más capital que PI.
Minería desde el móvil
A pesar de su reciente éxito, el protocolo
 Pi Network nació en 2019 en la Universidad de Stanford. Investigadores preocupados por el consumo energético de la minería decidieron crear una blockchain donde el proceso fuera menos costoso en términos energéticos.
A diferencia de criptomonedas como Bitcoin, que requieren hardware especializado y un alto consumo de energía, Pi Network permite a los usuarios minar la moneda desde sus teléfonos inteligentes. Para ello, han desarrollado un algoritmo de consenso llamado Stellar Consensus Protocol (SCP).
Este protocolo es más eficiente en términos de energía, ya que permite validar transacciones sin necesidad de una minería intensiva. Además, los usuarios pueden minar simplemente pulsando un botón en la aplicación diariamente para confirmar su participación en la red.
Tras más de seis años de desarrollo, el equipo de
Pi Network ha finalizado la fase de pruebas y ha lanzado su mainnet, poniendo la red finalmente a disposición del público. Este período ha permitido mejorar la red y sumar miles de usuarios, que hoy representan el mayor activo del proyecto.
El protocolo planea distribuir 100 mil millones de tokens PI, de los cuales poco más de 10 mil millones ya están en circulación. Con un 90% del suministro total aún por minar, Pi Network es uno de los proyectos que más interés genera, especialmente entre los jóvenes que no tuvieron la oportunidad de participar en las primeras etapas de Bitcoin.
«$PI es como Bitcoin en 2010», comparó la influencer Zoe, conocida como la Reina Crypto.
La criptomoneda Pi podría subir un 400%
El trader de criptomonedas Jacob Crypto Bury es optimista con el token Pi. En su cuenta de X, destacó que «es muy interesante ver» el rendimiento actual de Pi.
Además, compartió un análisis sobre la evolución del mercado, indicando que podría estar en una fase de «bear trap» (trampa bajista). Según su gráfico, aún hay un amplio margen para el crecimiento del token, que podría subir hasta un 400% cuando llegue el momento de «euforia».
Best Wallet Token: Una opción para inversores en Pi Network
Para quienes estén interesados en invertir en Pi Network, el
Best Wallet Token (BEST) podría ser una opción complementaria. BEST es el token nativo del ecosistema Best Wallet, una cartera no custodiada que ganó protagonismo en 2025 con su preventa.
El proyecto busca capturar el 40% del mercado de wallets no custodiadas, que se estima alcanzará un valor de $11 mil millones para 2026. La cartera admite miles de criptomonedas en más de 60 blockchains, incluyendo nuevos proyectos como PI, además de criptomonedas tradicionales como Bitcoin, Ethereum y USDT.
Además, los poseedores de
BEST disfrutan de varios beneficios, como tarifas reducidas en compras, ventas y swaps, recompensas de staking más altas, acceso anticipado a nuevas preventas y proyectos, derechos de gobernanza e incluso cashback en compras con el futuro Best Card, que está por lanzarse.
El token puede adquirirse a través de la preventa, con precios desde $0.024, o mediante un programa de airdrop que recompensa a los usuarios por completar tareas e interactuar en redes sociales. La preventa ya ha recaudado más de $10 millones.

author: vinaykumar.patil
title: Karnataka: Young man shouts objectionable slogans inside Ayodhya-bound train; Devotees halt train for 2 hours
text:
Karnataka: Young man shouts objectionable slogans inside Ayodhya-bound train; Devotees halt train for 2 hours Passengers aboard the Mysore to Ayodhya train faced a tumultuous journey when a youth shouted objectionable slogans at Hospet station, leading to a two-hour delay and demands for action. Authorities intervened, providing additional security. Despite protests, the train resumed its journey, marking a rare disruption in its 11th consecutive trip.
Vinaykumar Patil First Published Feb 23, 2024, 9:27 AM IST Follow Passengers aboard the Mysore to Ayodhya train experienced a tumultuous journey when a youth from a different community shouted objectionable slogans upon reaching Hospet railway station, resulting in a two-hour delay and fervent demands for action.
The youth raised slogans upon alighting from the train travelling from Mysore to Ayodhya. The incident, occurring on Thursday night, prompted passengers and devotees to halt the train for two hours, demanding swift repercussions for the accused. The atmosphere at the station grew tense as passengers and devotees voiced their concerns, insisting on strict action against the individual who allegedly used derogatory language. The devotees also shouted "Jai Sri Ram," while they were protesting against the accused.
Local authorities, including SP Sriharibabu and other police officers, swiftly intervened to diffuse the situation. After clarifying the circumstances surrounding the incident, the train resumed its journey, albeit two hours behind schedule. As a precautionary measure, the local police provided additional security to ensure the safety of pilgrims aboard the train. However, the outcry from protestors persisted, calling for the immediate arrest and punishment of the perpetrator.
This incident, which marks the 11th consecutive journey of the train to Ayodhya, is an anomaly, as such disruptions have been rare in the past. Despite the delay, authorities managed to persuade protestors to allow the train to proceed on its scheduled route.

author: The Hans India
title: India will be free of Maoist menace in next 3 years: Shah
text: Guwahati: Home Minister Amit Shah on Saturday said that India will be free of Maoist-related problems within the next three years. “Under leadership of Prime Minister Narendra Modi, the entire country will be 100 per cent free from the Maoist problems within the next three years,” Shah said while addressing 60th Raising Day celebrations of Sashastra Seema Bal (SSB) in Assam’s Tezpur town. He said that SSB soldiers are also performing duty in the Maoist affected areas of Chhattisgarh, Jharkhand and Bihar. “SSB along with CRPF and BSF have marginalised the Maoist movement,” Shah said. He said that SSB has set a target of increasing the number of women personnel in the force to six per cent by 2026 and has already achieved the target of 4 per cent. “SSB women soldiers have also taken part in challenging duties like the UN Mission and Amarnath Yatra,” he said. He said the SSB -- deployed in the service and security of the nation with the motto of service, security and brotherhood -- has a very glorious history. “SSB was established in 1963 after the India-China war. Thereafter, when Atal ji implemented the policy of One Border, One Force, SSB has been very dutifully manning India-Nepal border since 2001 and India-Bhutan border since 2004,” he said. He said that SSB has been guarding the 2,450 km long open borders with full alertness. “Be it forest, mountain, river or plateau, SSB personnel have never compromised with duty in any type of weather,” he said. Shah also said that SSB is a unique organization which has not only secured the borders, but has also faced terrorists and Naxalites in difficult areas. The force has also done the work of meticulously storing all the cultural, linguistic, geographical and historical information of all the villages near India-China, India-Nepal, and India-Bhutan border. Shah claimed to have given around 1 lakh 75 thousand jobs in security forces in the last nine years. “Ever since Narendra Modi became the Prime Minister of the country, a big campaign has been launched to fill the vacant posts and distribute the workload of border security personnel. Recruitment against one lakh 75 thousand vacancies has been completed since 2014. This is more than double the recruitments that take place in any other nine-year period.” Shah said that the Vibrant Village Scheme is the gift of Prime Minister Shri Narendra Modi to the border villages. “This scheme has been brought with a new conception that the border-village is not the last village of the country but the first village of the country, and the country begins from there,” he said.

author: Emily Chan
title: She Surprised Her Son With A Rapid-Fire Two-Minute Shopping Spree At A Bookstore For His Birthday
text:
As a kid, there’s nothing more exciting than when your birthday comes around and you get to rip open your presents to reveal the latest and greatest toy that you’ve been wanting for months.
When shopping for a kid’s birthday, toys are always the go-to gift because they’re guaranteed to be fun. However, one mother opted for a much less traditional present to surprise her son with.
For her son’s 12th birthday, Jaci (@jaciandmoore) took him to a bookstore and let him go on a two-minute shopping spree. She documented the occasion and posted the video to TikTok, which has now received two million views.
In the video, her son, Bentley, can be seen quickly grabbing several books off a shelf and stuffing them into a shopping bag after his mom set the timer for two minutes.
Immediately, Jaci knew she had underestimated how fast he was and jokingly stated that she had made a poor choice.
As Bentley continued filling the bag with books, she urged him to leave some behind for the other readers.
When the two minutes were finally up, Bentley’s bag contained a large stack of books that he struggled to carry as he headed over to the checkout counter. The total for all the books came out to $274.
The books that Bentley had selected were from a series called “Who HQ,” which features significant figures and events in history.
Among the titles he picked up were biographies on Alex Trebek, the singer Zendaya, and a story about the Civil Rights Movement. Before the shopping spree, Bentley had already collected 81 of these books.
Sign up for Chip Chick’s newsletter and get stories like this delivered to your inbox.

author: michael.hicks@futurenet.com (Michael L Hicks)
title: Meta Aria Gen 2 smart glasses look like serious upgrade on Ray-Ban Meta - 'Android Central
text:
Meta Aria Gen 2 smart glasses look like serious upgrade on Ray-Ban Meta
Quick Summary:
While we wait for Meta's Orion AR glasses, Meta is testing advanced AI tools in its Aria Gen 2 smart glasses.
And they last 6–8 hours — a 40% boost over the last gen — with no weight increase and looking significantly skinnier than the Meta Orion AR glasses.
These smart glasses use custom Meta silicon to process SLAM, eye tracking, hand tracking, and speech recognition on-device.

author: Angelo Ruggieri
title: Meteo Emilia Romagna: veloce perturbazione in transito con piogge e nevicate
text:
Un peggioramento delle condizioni meteorologiche interessa l’Emilia Romagna , a causa del transito di una veloce perturbazione tra il pomeriggio di oggi e le prime ore di sabato 14 dicembre . Le precipitazioni inizieranno a risalire da sud, coinvolgendo progressivamente l’intera regione. Sull’Appennino emiliano, sono attese nevicate a partire dai 500-700 metri di quota , mentre in Romagna i fiocchi di neve si manifesteranno a quote più elevate.
Le piogge attraverseranno rapidamente le pianure, lasciando accumuli modesti di circa 1-5 mm. Tuttavia, in alcune aree dell’Appennino, lungo il crinale, e in Romagna, in particolare nel forlivese, nel ravennate e sulla costa ferrarese, gli accumuli potrebbero raggiungere valori più significativi, compresi tra i 10 e i 15 mm. L’Emilia occidentale sarà la zona meno interessata da questo episodio perturbato , con fenomeni più sporadici o assenti.
Questo rapido passaggio perturbato segna un cambio di scenario meteorologico, che porterà una breve fase di instabilità con precipitazioni concentrate nelle aree montane e romagnole, lasciando altrove un impatto più limitato.
Per monitorare nel modo migliore possibile la situazione meteo in tempo reale, di seguito forniamo un elenco delle pagine con tutte le informazioni utili per seguire il nowcasting meteorologico minuto per minuto:
Di seguito i link per l’accesso diretto alle pagine con le previsioni meteo per le principali città della regione.

author: Jacky
title: Gypsy Rose Blanchard enjoys belated Christmas celebration with husband Ryan and dad Rod and family at Kansas rental home after her release from prison for killing Munchausen-by-proxy mom
text:
Christmas came a couple of days late for the newly released Gypsy Rose Blanchard, but she still managed to celebrate with family and friends.
His father Rod and stepmother Kristy were present at a secret Kansas City safe house on Thursday night, less than 24 hours after his release from a Missouri prison, DailyMail.com can reveal.
Munchausen, by indirect victim, Gypsy, was released from custody Thursday morning after serving seven years for the 2015 murder of her abusive mother Clauddine ‘Dee Dee’ Blanchard.
Her post-incarceration life began with a night at a budget hotel with her husband Ryan Anderson, followed by a trip to the Off Broadway Shoe Warehouse, where she posed for DailyMail.com in new sneakers and giggled: “I love them.”
Exclusive photos from DailyMail.com show Gypsy Rose’s father, Rod Blanchard, taking boxes and wrapping paper out of the garage on Thursday after a late Christmas celebration at a rental home in Kansas City.
Rod and his wife Kristy met with Gypsy for the first time since he was released from prison on Thursday after serving a seven-year sentence.
Gypsy Rose Blanchard created an Instagram account and posted her first selfie after prison.
Gypsy’s to-do list includes a book release, a docuseries, and snagging tickets to Sunday’s Kansas City Chiefs game, where she awaits an unlikely encounter with Taylor Swift and Travis Kelce.
But before that, she enjoyed an emotional Christmas gathering Thursday night with her father, stepmother Rod and Kristy Blanchard at the rented Kansas City home where she is staying with Teacher Ryan, 36.
A handful of close friends arrived with gifts for their newly freed friend while a television production crew filmed Gypsy’s every move.
Rod and his wife Kristy left the house early Friday morning, and were believed to be on their way back to Louisiana.
Kristy said last week how much Gypsy was looking forward to Christmas surrounded by family, even if Santa would have to wait three more days to visit her.
‘We’re going to have Christmas. I have a Christmas tree, I have so many gifts for it. I actually went overboard,’ Kristy told NewsNation.
‘Oh, we’re also going to do a spa day… we’re going to go give her pedicures, manicures, facials, haircuts, coloring if she wants, you know, everything, take her shopping. She can’t wait.
The family gathered for an emotional Christmas gathering Thursday night at the rented Kansas City home where she is staying with her husband and teacher Ryan, 36.
Rod and his wife Kristy left the house early Friday morning, believed to be on their way back to Louisiana, but not before picking up wrapping paper and packaging.
In interviews last week, family members described how much Gypsy looked forward to Christmas surrounded by her family.
Gypsy (pictured on the right as a child with her father) appears on the left in a prison photo with her father Rod and stepmother Kristy Blanchard.
On Friday, Gypsy celebrated her freedom by posting her first post-prison selfie on Instagram.
The 32-year-old shared a mirror photo of herself smiling in a faded blue and white sweater and jeans with the caption ‘First freedom selfie!’
In the first hour after posting the image, Blanchard garnered more than 160,000 likes and thousands of messages of support.
Blanchard spent her first day of freedom shopping for shoes and purchasing two pairs of sneakers at a nearby mall.
She was seen leaving the Fairfield Inn & Suites by Marriott in Chillicothe, Missouri, on Thursday, where she crashed overnight shortly after being released from prison nearly 12 hours earlier.
Wearing a worn sweatshirt, jeans and only socks on her feet, the ex-convict was helped by her husband as she carried her belongings, including two plastic bags full of snacks, to her silver Cadillac sedan, DailyMail.com photos show.
They then drove to a local shopping center where she bought two pairs of sneakers.
A handful of close friends arrived with gifts for their newly freed friend while a television production crew filmed Gypsy’s every move.
The guests arrive at the secret safe house to visit Gypsy Rose after her release.
The couple left the $150-a-night hotel around 11:15 a.m. in a convoy of cars that included producers and a camera crew who had been following the abuse victim during her Lifetime show.
They had installed GoPro cameras inside the car to capture his reaction.
Gypsy is expected to attend Sunday’s Kansas City Chiefs game against the Cincinatti Bengals at Arrowhead Stadium on Sunday for an unlikely meeting with Taylor Swift.
Hours earlier on Thursday, Ryan Scott Anderson, the teacher she married behind bars last year, was seen entering the Chillicothe Correctional Center in northern Missouri to pick up his wife at 3:20 a.m.
His Cadillac sedan, with a Bret ‘the Hitman’ Hart wrestling sticker on the front license plate cover, appeared minutes later to take Gypsy to her first night of freedom at the budget hotel.
The 32-year-old criminal spent her childhood posing as a wheelchair-bound invalid after Claudine ‘Dee Dee’ Blanchard shaved her daughter’s head, pumped her full of drugs and convinced the world she suffered from leukemia and muscular dystrophy.
Gypsy Rose Blanchard’s first stop Thursday was to an off-Broadway shoe store in Liberty, outside Kansas City, to buy some new shoes after leaving prison in her socks.
Gypsy was photographed in public for the first time since her release from prison after checking into a Fairfield Inn & Suites by Marriott in Chillicothe, where she spent her first night of freedom.
The two spent the rest of the night at a hotel in Chillicothe, before leaving later that morning to head to Kansas City.
Their ‘inseparable’ bond ended when Gypsy broke free of her mother’s twisted control in 2015 by allowing her smitten Internet boyfriend, Nicholas Godejohn, to sneak into her Springfield, Missouri, home to stab 48-year-old Dee Dee to death. years.
Gypsy was sentenced to 10 years in prison for matricide, but was granted early parole in September after friends and family pleaded with authorities to take into account the cruel abuse and unnecessary medical procedures she suffered while she was cynically paraded in charity events and fundraisers.
The network’s cameras have already been following her every move as Gypsy enjoys her first days of freedom, which will reportedly include a spa, a shopping trip and a Kansas City Chiefs game on Sunday, where she told TMZ that he hopes to meet up with Taylor Swift and Travis. Kelce.
Fans can expect more snippets on social media profiles created ahead of her release, including a TikTok page, which already has more than 400,000 followers, describing her as a “public figure/speaker” and links to her new book electronic, Published: Conversations. on the eve of freedom.
Gypsy’s media credits and prison interviews already include Dr Phil, Good Morning America and 20/20, while Hulu, Netflix and Lifetime have aired TV dramas based on her ordeal.
She was in the 2017 HBO documentary Mommy Dead and Dearest, and has an upcoming three-part docuseries, The Prison Confessions of Gypsy Rose Blanchard, airing January 5-7 on Lifetime.
